title: Player profile stats not updating at all
body:
My Player Profile stats just says 
"No ranked or normal games played this season.
Play some games to unlock your stats"
I have recently returned to LoL, just right before season 20 and my stats have been like that since then.
Can you help me?

replies.body: I am also having this problem, the "Stats" tab in my in-game profile page is not updating at all. Very frustrating.

Bump. 

Same issue here. Never had this happen. I use mobalytics' desktop app for stats but was looking to compare them with Riots version.

Fix fix.
Im having the same issue, says the same thing for me and not sure how to fix it. Ive tried to tweet LoL but good luck getting a reply also tried Riot

This is how easy it is to respond to comments/Help on the support page.                                    SUPPORT

Sorry for your issue but here at riot games we just stopped caring. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I have the exact same problem.
